description.value:
Trigger any damage is inflicted on the engine, or any attempt to disable it critically fails

Effect The entire mass of fungi shudders, then emits a piercing psychic scream as the trapped souls within cry out. All non-fungi creatures in area E3 take @Damage[10d6[spirit]] damage (@Check[will|dc:41|basic] save), and four vansidieth demons waiting for this precise alarm use translocate to teleport into the room to attack the intruders. The hazard then rolls initiative.

stealth.details: (legendary) to notice the fungi is potentially hazardous and that the two mushrooms in the middle are load bearing and that destroying those with damage can disable the hazard; noticing the engine itself has a DC of 0

details.description: A thick mass of pulsing fungi and mold infested with ghostly shapes cakes the walls of the room.
details.disable: @Check[nature|dc:41] seven times to seek out and remove seven specific nodes of fungi that govern the intake and dispersal of energy, or @Check[religion|dc:47] three times to exorcise the souls out of the engine and force it to shut down

publication.title: Pathfinder #212: A Voice in the Blight

details.reset: The fungal engine deactivates and resets after 1 minute, but any demons called in remain in the area for an hour to ensure the intruders don't return.
details.routine:
(1 action) The fungal engine expels clouds of toxic spores on its turn, causing all non-fungi and non-demon creatures in the room to take @Damage[10d6[poison]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:41|basic] save); any creature that takes damage is exposed to grayshroud.

Grayshroud

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:40]

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued] (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} and fatigued (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} and fatigued (1 day)

Stage 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 3}, fatigued, and can't speak (1 day)

Stage 5 death
